title: Crashing
body: Just had a game where both teams were completely dcing and lost a ranked because of it... wth riot

replies.body: I had the same issue. I even got a leaverbuster when I tried to load back in constantly. Submitted a ticket to remove the leaverbuster at least but ofc human response takes forever and the bot is useless for situations like these.
How odd, everyone dc'd in my game and when i connected there is one person from my team and enemy able to play and everyone else just dc'd after reconnect. At the moment its a malph vs elise lol
I'm currently in my 2nd game today, and both games I've been the recipient of dc'ing in match #feelsbadman Loss prevention and compensation for those who got dc'ed please Rito.
Having the same issue right now, can reload then silent crash to desktop after less than 30s in game

Yeah it doesn't seem to be just us either as there were about 5 players experiencing this same issue, saying it was due to streaming software or something?? 3 on my team, 2 on the other, and yet we lose elo because of it, smh
Yeah exactly same symptoms, looks like ranked is down now while they check it out
So is riot just ignoring us? Leaving us with no compensation whatsoever?

With regards to compensation, Riot *can't* compensate LP, it causes all sorts of backend calculation drama that would hurt players far more than just copping a lost game or two. It's likely the issue was resolved upon detection and therefore before loss prevention could be turned on given it only seemed to be affecting some players for about an hour or two.
stil happening apparently. had a game just fine, next game got to 15 minutes, then constant critical error DC
Either that or some form of compensation
Would have been the update as it was definitely not an internet issue..
